name: Jschlatt Summer Internship
description:
--- Welcome to JSI terminal ---
Below you will be able to download the virtual internship program, where you will experience a lifelike™ simulation of one of our trainees.

--- Experience ---
Watch the pope like never before. By joining our 6 night trial, with this you will challenged yourself, and even have the chance at joining us at JSI.inc!

-- Our Creator -- 
This game was created by our almighty creator, for entertainment to his loyal viewers (If he had any). Below you will be able to view his process of making the game.
